sentences.en: Islander points to inhabitant of an island.
sentences.cn: 岛民是指岛屿上的居民.

sentences.en: Sophia wouldn't be such damned fool as to love that South Seas Islander!
sentences.cn: 莎菲不会傻到如此地步去爱上南洋人.

sentences.en: The islanders endured centuries of exploitation.
sentences.cn: 岛民们忍受了几个世纪的剥削。

trans.tran_en: someone who lives on an island
